title: Follow live: USMNT, Costa Rica headed to penalty kicks with spot in semifinals on the line
author: ESPN

title: Sources: Rockets' Smith to sign $122M extension
description: Rockets forward Jabari Smith Jr. intends to sign a five-year, $122 million rookie contract extension, sources told ESPN.
author: Shams Charania

title: 'Ballon d'Or' James makes England return before Euros
description: Lauren James makes her return for England as she recovers from a three-month injury lay-off.

title: 'Fulfilling' win gives Norris 'good confidence' before Silverstone
description: Lando Norris says his victory in the Austrian Grand Prix was "fulfilling" as he heads into his home race next weekend.

title: Norris withstands Piastri pressure for big Austrian GP win
description: Lando Norris withstood pressure from team-mate Oscar Piastri to claim a crucial win over his title rival in the Austrian Grand Prix and get his F1 world championship bid back on track.

title: Chelsea agree deal to sign Pedro with forward to join CWC squad
description: Chelsea have agreed a deal worth up to Â£60m for Brighton forward Joao Pedro.

title: Jabari Smith Jr. expected to sign big contract extension with Rockets, per report
description: Forward Jabari Smith Jr. is expected to sign a five-year, $122 million contract extension with the Houston Rockets, per reports.

title: Full Boston Celtics 2025 Las Vegas Summer League schedule released
description: As usual, the contests will be taking place on the campus of UNLV at one of two adjacent locations, either the Thomas and Mack Center, or the Pavilion.
